name: Enterprise T1
description: The base enterprise plan unlocks the use of enterprise models, white glove support and our fastest service. Ideal for teams who take AI transformation seriously.

usageDetails.weProvide: First $500 free each month. Afterwards, 10% orchestration fee for using models SmythOS provides, including Tasks & Weaver. Bringing your own API keys and models is always free.
usageDetails.runWeaver: $3 per 1M Input Tokens, $12 per 1M Output Tokens + 10% Orchestration

name: Enterprise T2
description: This is the minimum plan for which we will help the customer install SmythOS agents to a single AWS enterprise instance.

usageDetails.weProvide: First $1,000 free each month. 8% orchestration fee for models SmythOS provides, including Tasks & Weaver. Bringing your own API keys and models is always free. Running tasks on your own cloud is always free.
usageDetails.runWeaver: $3 per 1M Input Tokens, $12 per 1M Output Tokens + 8% Orchestration

name: Enterprise T3
description: This is like T2 plan, but we'll support a second enterprise instance installation for SRE. This plan can also make sense to companies who want to support large teams of 100+ at the best price. The modal usage markup is 40% lower than our T1 plan.

usageDetails.weProvide: First $2,000 free each month. 6% orchestration fee for models SmythOS provides, including Tasks & Weaver. Bringing your own API keys and models is always free. Running tasks on your own cloud is always free.
usageDetails.runWeaver: $3 per 1M Input Tokens, $12 per 1M Output Tokens + 8% Orchestration

name: Enterprise T4
description: The secret to this plan is the $10,000 credits included, making it almost as affordable as the T3 plan, except you also double the users, storage, and lower the model usage cost even more. The perfect plan for those who want it all.

usageDetails.weProvide: First $10,000 free each month. 5% orchestration fee for models SmythOS provides, including Tasks & Weaver. Bringing your own API keys and models is always free. Running tasks on your own cloud is always free.
usageDetails.runWeaver: $3 per 1M Input Tokens, $12 per 1M Output Tokens + 8% Orchestration

name: Partner
description: For startups building AI automations, agents, and APIs.

usageDetails.weProvide: First $10,000 free each month. 5% orchestration fee for models SmythOS provides, including Tasks & Weaver. Bringing your own API keys and models is always free. Running tasks on your own cloud is always free.
usageDetails.runWeaver: $3 per 1M Input Tokens, $12 per 1M Output Tokens + 8% Orchestration
